channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DB2 for Linux- UNIX and Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DB2 for Linux- UNIX and Windows

item.title: CVE-2020-4363|2024-09-17T02:11:32.782Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 178960.

item.title: CVE-2020-4355|2024-09-17T03:07:54.174Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux-%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) renegotiation requests. By sending specially-crafted requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to increase the resource usage on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 178507.
